metadata.name: Desert Soar
metadata.description:
As an aviation enthusiast, I have always been fascinated by abandoned airplanes and the stories they hold. After weeks of travel, I stumbled upon a breathtaking sight in Arizona - four airplanes, left on an open field by a farm. 

I could hardly believe it when I saw the airplanes in perfect alignment and I knew this was an opportunity too good to pass up. I couldn't wait to capture this scene from above with the drone.

A reminder of how beauty can be found even in unexpected places.

Artist: Charles Martinez

Title: Desert Soar

Edition: 1/1

Location : Arizona

Year Created : Apr 2018

Size: 2177 x 2721

Gear : Phantom 3 Pro

Genre : Aerial Photography

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising,
